Servy.CLI.commandLineArgs: install --name "WexflowServer2" --description "Wexflow Engine" --path "C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" --startupDir "C:\Program Files\Wexflow Server\Wexflow.Server" --params "Wexflow.Server.dll" --startupType "" --priority "belowNormal" --stdout "C:\Program Files\Wexflow Server\stdout.log" --stderr "C:\Program Files\Wexflow Server\stderr.log" --enableRotation true --rotationSize 1048576 --enableHealth true --heartbeatInterval 5 --maxFailedChecks 1 --recoveryAction restartService --maxRestartAttempts 2
